title: Manager facilitates community stakeholder meetings transparently
description: Manager facilitates community stakeholder meetings transparently
content:
Scenario: Manager facilitates community stakeholder meetings transparently
    Given community investors and customers want to provide input
    And workers want community perspective while maintaining autonomy
    When annual stakeholder meeting occurs
    Then Marcus facilitates meeting ensuring all voices are heard
    And Marcus presents operational updates transparently
    And Marcus helps translate community input into actionable worker proposals
    But Marcus doesn't filter or control community input
    And workers make final decisions on community suggestions
    And community_elohim ensures facilitation doesn't manipulate outcomes
